title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Pripyat
notes: The game freezes when saving, alt-tabbing fixes the problem.

title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Pripyat
notes: Linux performance on par with native Windows, but experiences rare, minimal texture pop-in. Game has not been fully tested, but all preliminary/introductory cut-scene movies and missions operate as intended. Current game operations are at maximum graphics settings with dynamic global lighting; all settings including keyboard and mouse mappings persist.

title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Pripyat
notes: Game needs to be started with "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" launch option, also english keyboard needs to be selected in OS as default.

Add this to the launch options: PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%
Runs OK after that.
